subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Even though Livan Hernandez pitched superbly and Daniel Murphy excelled at first base, the Mets’ offense continued its hibernation in a loss to the L.A. Dodgers.
snippet: Even though Livan Hernandez pitched superbly and Daniel Murphy excelled at first base, the Mets’ offense continued its hibernation in a loss to the L.A. Dodgers.
